markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kraken's Guard](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1292)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38</row>

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 16, HP 96, BT 48) is painted a mottled crimson, and it always glistens as if wet. Its crest is composed of eight appendages that curl around each other, resembling the swirling tentacles of a giant [kraken](/Monsters.aspx?ID=275). Two ferocious eyes sit in its center, gleaming with an inner light.

<document level="2" id="action-1022" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Kraken's Guard
